app.title: AgroVibes
app.subtitle: Farming community, marketplace, and learning hub — in one place.
app.footer: This is a front-end MVP prototype. To make it production-ready, connect it to a backend (authentication, database, payments, notifications) and deploy on web and mobile.

media.title: Media Sharing & Stories
media.description: Farmers share daily life, practices, and equipment in photo and video form. Consumers follow, like, and learn.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Exchange
knowledge.description: Step-by-step guides, quick tutorials, and space for live Q&A between experienced and new farmers.
knowledge.liveQADesc: In a full version, mentors would schedule live sessions. Farmers can submit questions ahead of time and join via video.

equipment.title: Equipment Marketplace
equipment.description: Farmers showcase equipment for sale or rental with tutorials and simple scheduling.

labor.title: Labor Connections
labor.description: Farmers discover skilled workers, and laborers list their skills, availability, and location.
labor.postJobNote: This is a simple front-end prototype. Jobs you add will stay only in your current browser session.

products.title: Fertilizers & Seeds Guidance
products.description: Compare organic and chemical options with clear instructions, benefits, and risks.

sales.title: Direct Farmer-to-Customer Sales
sales.description: Farmers list produce with transparent pricing. Consumers buy directly with minimal middlemen.
sales.cartEmpty: Add some farm products to see them here.

learning.title: Learning Hub & Gamification
learning.description: Courses, best practices, and badges to motivate continuous learning and experimentation.

community.title: Community & Future Features
community.description: A home for farmer influencers, success stories, and upcoming smart-farming integrations.
community.influencersDesc: In the full platform, creators would host channels, live sessions, and sponsored demos for brands.
community.aiCrop: AI Crop Diagnosis — farmers upload plant images to detect diseases and get treatment suggestions.
community.droneIot: Drone & IoT Integration — monitor fields, automate spraying, and track microclimate data.
community.blockchain: Blockchain Traceability — ensure farm-to-fork transparency for premium buyers.
community.government: Government Integrations — surface schemes, subsidies, and support programs matched to each farmer.
